name: Planet jumper (IncogKneeToe)
description:
All you have to do in this game letting your ship fly into the hole on the opposite side of the map. 

You'll do this by timing your jumps from planet to planet, while dodging the astroids and not flying into the sides of the map.

Getting in orbit of a planet with the left side of your ship makes it rotate counterclockwise and with the right makes it rotate clockwise around the planet.

CONTROLS:

SPACE - jumping out of orbit
M - mute
R - quick restart for people that are to lazy to use the mouse for it (people like me :-) )

maybe this also deserves an epilepsy warning :/
